participant_1.background:

I like to do all my shopping at walmart.

participant_2.background:
I am a cyclist.
My father used to be a cop.
I work at a restaurant as waiter.
My favorite food is pizza.
I am single.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cycle! I'm a member of a cycling club and we go on rides every week.
That's awesome! I used to cycle a lot when I was younger, but I haven't done it in a while.
You should get back into it! It's a great way to get exercise and see some amazing scenery.
I think I will! Where do you like to cycle?
I usually cycle in the city, but I also like to go for longer rides in the countryside.
That sounds like fun! I'm sure I would enjoy it.
You should definitely give it a try!
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, watch TV, and read books.
I like to do those things too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mystery novels.
Me too! I love historical fiction because it's so interesting to learn about the past.
I agree! I also like mystery novels because they're so suspenseful.
Me too! I love trying to figure out who the killer is.
Me too! I'm always so excited to turn the pages and find out what happens next.
Me too! I love the feeling of being on the edge of my seat.
Me too! It's so exciting!
